name: Caterpillars Burrow
description:
(Note: This is a remix of Ll010's red rabbits diner on scratch.)

You are looking for a job, That doesn't need much skill, As you don't have much in the skill Section, But Good news! You found a job! at Caterpillars Burrow! A kids place that serves pizza! And they're two mascots, Good Caterpillar, And Tarry The ant! But after one night.. You instantly regret it..

A= Open Door

D=Close Door

F=FlashLight

Note: If you cant go in the Dining Hall (dhall), That means both Tarry  and Good Caterpillar are in there.

If you see Caterpillar (green) At the door, Close it, And he will leave.

Tarry (red) Will go in the vents, click on the black spot on his head for him to go away.
